QueryDefinition.Query:
WITH nullFields as ( select 'delmeth' as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'delonset'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'delinten'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'delchang'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'delpren'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'delposn'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'anagest'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'matage'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'neodur'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'antedur'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'postdur'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'intdays'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'acpspef'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'elecdate'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField union select 'elecdur'as fieldName, 1 as isNullField ), hospitalLookup as ( select a.id, a.fieldname, '2-'+cast(row_number() OVER(Order By a.fieldname) as varchar(256)) as observation_source_value, b.fieldid from ( select 'admimeth' id ,'admimeth' fieldname union select 'admisorc' id ,'admisorc' fieldname union select 'disdest' id ,'disdest' fieldname union select 'dismeth' id ,'dismeth' fieldname union select 'duration' id ,'duration' fieldname union select 'elecdate' id ,'elecdate' fieldname union select 'elecdur' id ,'elecdur' fieldname ) as a left join {sc}.hes_fielddefinitions b on a.fieldname = b.fieldname and b.class in ('Admissions', 'Discharges') ), mappings as ( SELECT distinct FieldId, REPLACE(Value, '0', '') Value, Description FROM {sc}.hes_fieldmappings where Value like '0%' and len(Value) = 2 union SELECT DISTINCT FieldId, Value, Description FROM {sc}.hes_fieldmappings ), hospital as ( SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, ISNULL(CAST(admimeth AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') admimeth, ISNULL(CAST(admisorc AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') admisorc, ISNULL(CAST(disdest AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') disdest, ISNULL(CAST(dismeth AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') dismeth, ISNULL(CAST(duration AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') duration, ISNULL(CAST(elecdate AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') elecdate, ISNULL(CAST(elecdur AS nvarchar(50)), '9999999') elecdur FROM {sc}.hes_hospital JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID WHERE admidate IS NOT NULL ), hospital_unp as ( SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'admimeth' as fieldname, admimeth as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'admisorc' as fieldname, admisorc as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'disdest' as fieldname , disdest as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'dismeth' as fieldname , dismeth as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'duration' as fieldname, duration as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'elecdate' as fieldname, elecdate as var_code from hospital union SELECT patid, spno, admidate, discharged, 'elecdur' as fieldname , elecdur as var_code from hospital )
select patid, spno, l.observation_source_value, 900000007 as observation_type_concept_id, CASE WHEN l.id IN ('disdest', 'dismeth') THEN discharged ELSE admidate END AS observation_date, CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL THEN description WHEN description IS NULL AND var_code IS NOT NULL THEN var_code ELSE NULL END AS value_as_string from hospital_unp JOIN hospitalLookup l ON l.id = hospital_unp.fieldname LEFT JOIN nullFields n ON l.fieldname = n.fieldname LEFT JOIN mappings m ON l.fieldid = m.fieldid AND ((var_code = '9999999' AND m.value = 'null') OR (var_code = m.value)) WHERE var_code != '' AND (var_code != '9999999' OR (isNullField = 1 AND var_code = '9999999')) order by patid
